title: Sri Lanka Kagoshima
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Beer/Wine, Sri Lankan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pleasant Sri Lankan restaurant run by a vegetarian from Sri Lanka, located in a busy shopping area. Offers food without garlic or onion and is popular with local vegetarians and vegans. Always has vegan dahl and samosas, some days a vegan lunch set.
